DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate long-term safety SPARC0913 . A multicenter , open label , non-randomized , uncontrolled , single group assignment , safety study subject primary open angle glaucoma ocular hypertension plan . Subjects receive study medication period 24-weeks .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Safety SPARC0913 Open Angle Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , open label , non-randomized , single-arm , extension safety study evaluate long-term safety SPARC0913 . Subjects complete prior evaluator-masked clinical non-inferiority Study participate current study .
